text: Hagi Anumzamo'a azerintesga huno ra agi amigeno, ruzahu ruzahu zamavufagane vahe'ma, ru zamageru ru zamageru'ma neru'za kokankokama nemaniza vahe'mo'za, agrikura koro nehu'zma zamahirahiku hu'naze. Ana nehuno negafa'a hankave nekino, izano ahe frinaku'ma himofona ahe nefrino, izano atre'nugeno manisanie himofona atregeno nemanigeno, agra avesite ragima aminaku'ma himofona ra agia nemino, azeri fenkami atrenaku'ma himofona azeri fenkami netre.
